AxiSEM-3D_shapes
=================

I am still writing this documentation sorry!!!

.. toctree::

   documentation


Overview:
=========
AxiSEM-3D_shapes is a package for adding shapes such as spheres and slabs to your AxiSEM-3D Cartesian simulations. Any number of shapes can be specified and added to a .nc file that can then be implemented into AxiSEM-3D simulations.

To get started, go to the installation page.
